description: Eat a tasty fish to permanently increase its health by $1 and damage by $2. At max ($3) stacks, gains |proper(devour), healing for $4% of its max health each time it gets a kill.
name: Spirit Offering
tooltip: Eat a tasty fish to permanently increase its health by 280 and damage by 15. At max (7) stacks, gains Devour, healing for 1% of its max health each time it gets a kill.
